raw_output:
Extract structured information from the following text and return only the structured JSON output:

E.P.H.E.
Ecole Pratique des Hautes Etudes UMR CNRS 5244 Biologie Ecologie Tropicale et Méditerranéenne UNIVERSITE DE PERPIGNAN 52,Avenue PAUL ALDUY 66860 PERPIGNAN CEDEX France Tél. +33(0)4 68 66 21 90 Fax. +3... (no fax number provided)
E-mail: [info@ephe.fr](mailto:info@ephe.fr)
Website: http://www.ephe.fr

E.P.H.E. is a research center located in Perpignan, France. It is part of the Université de Perpignan. The center is focused on the study of tropical and Mediterranean ecosystems, and its research activities are organized around several key themes: 

*   Tropical and Mediterranean ecosystems
*   Biodiversity and conservation
*   Climate change and its impacts on ecosystems
*   Human-environment interactions
*   Sustainable development

The center is composed of several research units, including:

*   Unité de Recherche en Biologie des Ecosystemes Tropicaux (URBET)
*   Unité de Recherche en Biologie des Ecosystemes Méditerranéennes (URBEM)
*   Unité de Recherche en Biologie des Ecosystemes Tropicaux et Méditerranéennes (URBET-MED)
*   Unité de Recherche en Biologie des Ecosystemes et des Systèmes (URBES)

These research units are involved in various projects and collaborations with other research centers and institutions
